title: FS: T206 Piedmont George Brown - SGC 45
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Piedmont George Brown - SGC 45
posts.post_content: Presents quite well for the grade, and wouldn't look out of place in a 5 holder, as there are no creases or wrinkles. Asking $75 net delivered, PayPal preferred.
